title: Ep. 250: Manicures During the Pandemic, Mink Lashes & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 250: Manicures During the Pandemic, Mink Lashes & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: Will the salon manicure look the same when the pandemic is over? Can mink lashes ever be cruelty-free? We have definitive answers—and some deeper discussion on these topics. Plus, we’ll fill you in on the beauty headlines: Black Friday & Cyber Mond...
description:
Will the salon manicure look the same when the pandemic is over? Can mink lashes ever be cruelty-free? We have definitive answers—and some deeper discussion on these topics. Plus, we’ll fill you in on the beauty headlines: Black Friday & Cyber Monday deals; a new Italian beauty marketplace; Ulta’s collaboration with Target; an invention that speeds up salon and spa services; and why bookstores smell so good. - Want more of our beauty podcast? Ep. 250's recap, notes, and product links: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
